plants.name: Monstera Borsigiana Albo Variegated
plants.description: The Variegated Monstera Borsigiana Albo is a coveted plant which is grown by our experienced staff is sure to please. This is a rooted plant, not a cutting. plants.name: Monstera Aurea
plants.description: Monstera Aurea, also known as Monstera Marmorata, is a variegated cultivar of the classic variegated Monstera deliciosa. It, basically, is a more stunning variety of the popular Monstera deliciosa plant. The lemon and lime, and dark-green variegation occur in a similar pattern to what you‚Äôd expect to find on Monstera Albo, with blocks and splashes of variegation and some leaves that are solidly half and half.
